Label.en: On Fridays, people would either eat fish, or nothing at all, so it was pretty important!
Label.fr: Le vendredi étant le jour du poisson (ou du jeûne...), le poisson était devenu une affaire sérieuse !

Label.en: For a few hundred years, men on foot would walk alongside horses loaded with fish baskets

Label.en: After each tide, they would walk day and night to Paris
